articles.title: ‘India reports 82 positive cases of new Covid-19 strain’: Health ministry - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Central government created a network of 10 advanced labs across the country last month to step up disease surveillance in the wake of mutations detected in the Sars-Cov-2 virus.
